metadata.description: Churning under the twisted streets and elaborate architecture of Washington DC is a dark force: The Thrum. As the forces of darkness threaten to engulf the nation's capital, one of The Society's most promenade members, Frederic Farley Farnhan, is far more focused on his daughter's society debut than the growing danger all around him. Will the whole affair become a coming out party from hell? Based on the hit Namco game named one of the Thirty must-have for the iPhone and iPod touch. Unearth the strange and undying world of Garters & Ghouls!
metadata.name: Garters & Ghouls
